page.title: 09Family life
page.content: We rise at 7.30 am.The School Taxi collects us at 9 am as we live 7 miles from School.Dad works as a handyman, Mum works as cook. At School there are 19 pupils. MORNINGS:Maths,English and Reading. AFTERNOONS:Art,Projects,Music etc. Physical Education,Computer!(new this year) and Video. School finishes at 4 pm.When we go home we have tea and watch television. Our favourite Home Computer game is Avalon.You become a wizard and have to collect magic to make power to fight the wicked Sorcerer,Avalack. Our house is on the caravan site by Castle Sween.We play near the castle but can't go inside it as the structure is not safe.It is said to be the oldest stone built castle in Scotland.
